title: Bug 137464: Data preview not refreshing after applying a filter in chart editor's select data page
EB: After applying a filter, the data preview in the chart editor's select data page does not refresh.
SR:
Description: When applying a filter on a Join dataset in the chart editor's select data page, the data preview part is not refreshed. 

        Steps to Reproduce: 

        1. Open the attached file. 

        2. Create a chart and choose the select data page. 

        3. Use the Join dataset and set the X Y series.
